channel.title: My own offline rsc server
channel.description:
Hey, I've been googling for hours to setup my own RSC server, fooled around with n00bscape v3 and that didn't result into much at all. The conclusion being that this will take me way too long to setup, if I'd eventually be able to that is.
I'd like to know if anyone is willing to consider to make me a server that I can use personally, and being able to add items/change stats.
What it comes down to: I just want a server of my own where I can go crazy with items, stats and overall just fool around. It has to be user friendly as I am total beginner in coding.
Is this even possible? If so, I will pay for it.

item.title: My own offline rsc server
item.dc:creator: @xAdyx xAdyx
item.description:
@xAdyx wrote:

I’d recomand you to start with NoobScape v3, it’s pretty simple … but if you can find Yong’s latest release BrutalPkers it’s more developed and lot of bugs fixed. If you need help i can give a hand on skype .

Read full topic
